author: A_Brickset_user
title: not the worst
review: But this has to be in the worst 3 classic space sets ever, it was like they tried to think of the cheapest way to get a whole set, if this was sold on it's own, no-one would have bought it, I'm sure people only own it because of the cool 1558 it came with.

author: david001
title: US only?
review:
I'm not too sure where the US only description of this model came from: I'm from Northern Ireland, have never been to America (nor have any of my immediate family) and I own this set!

As for the model: while it does its job, it's probably best used as a source for pieces for other creations.

author: istiboule
title: My first set...
review:
This set is simply my best one, not by its size, or its parts, just cause it's my first set, received in 1986. The beginning of an awsome collection...
This set is also a great one cause i think more a set is simple, more a set is fun.
This is lego power : Be able to develop big models, with thousand of parts, and on the other side, build smaller sets, with only one minifig, but very efficient.
I put a "5" for all these reasons.
Long life to lego space !

author: hustla187
title: Not That Bad
review: For a small ship, this really isn't that bad. The only thing that bothers me is that there are too many blue pieces than silver pieces. This is also a good idea to build an army off of this set. This set is good but not the best.
